palamu rahathan wahansela hata ek nama amatha budu himiyan pawasu wachana hamuwe jana sanniwedanaye nirwachanayak apata hamuwe.gam niyamgam sarisaranna thaniwa hasiremin awaboda kara gaththa sathya pahadili karanna .me jana sanniwedanaya yatharthaya matha padanam wuwak bawata path kala awasthawaki.thawath keneku kiyu deyak pilibada anawabodayen prakasha kirimak nowa.sathya pracharanaya hamuwe yodawa thibe.ema hata ek nama thaman wisin thama manasata labu sahanaya shakthiya thawath ayata laba gannata udaw kara atha.namuth owun hata thawa ayeku hata maya balayakin men rahathbawa ho sowan palaya labadimak natha ema pudgalayin labu athdakima banak wiya sathya dahamak wiya .ada apahata naththeda mema shakthin matha pihita sidu karanu labana krayawanya.
